# UIActivity.Category.share

**Case**

Activities whose primary purpose is to share the selected item, like sending an image by email.

## Declaration

```swift
case share
```

## Constants

- **UIActivity.Category.action**: Activities whose primary purpose is to take an action on the selected item, like copying an image or saving it to the camera roll.

items.description: Activities whose primary purpose is to take an action on the selected item, like copying an image or saving it to the camera roll.
items.name: UIActivity.Category.action

title: UIActivity.Category.share
